attributes.action: Do not cut aid to Yemen
attributes.additional_details:
The government has cut aid to Yemen from 164 million to just 87 million whilst the US has pledged an extra £191 million.
 The UN chief has condemned this decision calling it a death sentence for the people of Yemen, 20 million of whom rely on humanitarian aid for survival.
attributes.background: We want the UK government to increase the amount of humanitarian aid to Yemen.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577527
